document.discussion_title: Why isn't the killing of 1.5 million Armenians officially called a 'genocide'?
document.topic_text: Why are we talking about this now? Around 15, 000 demonstrators in the Armenian capital of Yerevan held a torchlit march to a hilltop memorial complex dedicated to the 1.5 million people killed by the Ottoman Turks more than 100
